Easy and quick way to check the balance of bitcoin addresses.

Bitcoin Address Checker (BitAC) is an open-source application designed to be lightweight and fast. The idea is to provide Android users an easy and quick way to check the balance of bitcoin addresses.

This application does not provide and is not intended to provide any functionality of a bitcoin wallet, so you can not receive, send or save bitcoins with BitAC, you can only check how many bitcoins a wallet has.

If you like to report a problem, propose a solution, or ask questions, you can go to the application repository at the following address: https://github.com/ademar111190/BitAC you can also send an email to ademar111190@gmail.com.

All contributions are welcome, from text corrections to new languages translations, from design improvements to a full UX/UI redesign, from a simple bug-fix to a new feature, please feel free to contribute.

The application uses the blockchain.info API, ideally it would have its own service, however to maintain a server would cost money, so if you want to contribute to the project financially you can donate bitcoin to the following address: 1DPYudPDKLxnFkTtDUbWrEZZhfbuHoWgX8. Thanks!
